title: FS: T206 Marquard SGC 70 and T206 Mathewson (dark cap) PSA 2
author: Cy2009

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Marquard SGC 70 and T206 Mathewson (dark cap) PSA 2
posts.post_content:
Hi,

I have two Hall of Famers for sale today. 

The first is a T206 of Rube Marquard (hands at thighs). It is graded SGC 70 and is very nice for the grade. The price of this card, delivered and insured is $410.

[IMG]http://www.cyscards.com/t206/picsb/06-294b.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://www.cyscards.com/t206/picsb/06-294rb.jpg[/IMG]

The next card is a PSA 2 of Christy Mathewson (dark cap). There are no major creases, the color and registration are beautiful. The price of this card, delivered and insured is $255.

[IMG]http://www.cyscards.com/t206/picsb/06-298b.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://www.cyscards.com/t206/picsb/06-298rb.jpg[/IMG]


To buy either of these cards, send me an E-mail at: [url]cy@cyscards.com[/url]

Thanks.

Cy
[url]www.cyscards.com[/url]
